hymn.title: Therefore the redeemed of the Lord shall return

layout.singingstanza: There -- fore the re -- deemed of the Lord shall re -- turn, And come with sing -- ing un -- to Zi -- on; And ev -- er -- last -- ing joy shall be up -- on their head. There -- fore the re -- deemed of the Lord shall re -- turn, And come with sing -- ing un -- to Zi -- on; And ev -- er -- last -- ing joy shall be up -- on their head. They shall ob -- tain glad -- ness and joy; And sor -- row and mourn -- ing shall flee a -- way. There -- fore the re -- deemed of the Lord shall re -- turn, And come with sing -- ing un -- to Zi -- on; And ev -- er -- last -- ing joy shall be up -- on their head.
